DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if the use of a diabetic scorecard during clinic visits can improve glycemic control, blood pressure control, LDL-cholesterol, aspirin usage, and amount of exercise in adults over age 40 with uncontrolled Type II diabetes.
